Daily Specials

Sliders

3 cheeseburger sliders topped w/ American Cheese. Mix them up! Request a pulled pork slider, chicken tender slider. Served with fries.

$8.95

Bomb Burger

This Burger is the BOMB! Topped with caramelized onions, bacon, blue marble cheese and seasoned mayo. Served with chips and a pickle.

$9.95

Cuban Sandwich

Sliced ham, pulled pork with melted swiss cheese and pickles. Topped with our spicy mustard sauce on a hoagie bun.

$9.95

Strawberry Shrimp Salad

Crisp romaine lettuce with grilled shrimp, fresh strawberries and mandarin oranges. Topped with blue cheese crumbles. Served with basalmic Vinegarette dressing on the side.

$10.95

Smoked Salmon

Dirty Jack's Smokin' Salmon served with cream cheese, Brisquets, hard boiled egg and our house lemon dill caper sauce.

$11.95

Calzone

Our own handmade pizza pocket. Your choice of 3 pizza toppings with mozzerrella cheese and marinara sauce. Baked and dusted with Italian herbs.

$8.95

Pigs Eye Burger

Our juicy burger topped with pulled pork, bacon and melted cheese. Served with chips and BBQ sauce on the side.

$9.95

Chicago Style Hot Dog

A Nathans Hot Dog on a poppy seed bun topped with sliced tomatoes, pickle spears, sport peppers, diced onions, mustard and relish. Served with chips.

$8.95

Dessert Special

Apple Strudel topped with vanilla ice cream, roasted almonds and homemade caramel sauce!

$4.95

Ask your server about our other desserts!
